title: Technical Lead SRE, Storage
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to phenomenal work...
description: We are looking for a technical lead seasoned in software and systems to join the Storage SRE team at Apple. The role involves tremendous amount of individual responsibility as well as influence over the direction of the various distributed storage services at Apple...
preferred_qualifications: Awareness of best practices for deployment of storage systems - implication of physical and virtual deployment models to change management, failure domains, hardware lifecycle management, etc...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
